channel.description: Recent content in DF on Bodacious Blog

item.title: (WIP) How to play Dwarf Fortress (in fortress mode)
item.description: https://df-walkthrough.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Navigating left hand should sit on keys 1 to 4. right hand should sit on keys 6 to 9. pinkies navigate bottom left to top right. index fingers navigate top left to bottom right Memorise them as they may be useful They are also useful in brogue. They may also be useful in other programs. I can memorise them and then use them in all sorts of situations.
